izzy.datasets.random_modeling_dataset¶

izzy.datasets.random_modeling_dataset(n_observations=1000000, n_predictors=5, class_balance=0.5)[source]¶

Wrapper function to initialize an instance of izzy.datasets.RandomModelingDataset

Parameters

  • n_observations (int) – Number of observations (Default: 1000000).

  • n_predictors (int) – Number of predictors (Default: 5).

  • class_balance (float) – How should the class be balanced? (Default: 0.5)

Returns

Random modeling dataset

Return type

pandas.DataFrame

Previous topic

izzy.datasets.random_dataset

Next topic

izzy.features
